Kementerian ESDM buka Lowongan Formasi CPNS, Ada Persyaratan yang Harus Disiapkan
03 Nov 2019, 10:55 by Ai Rika Rachmawati
BANDUNG, (PR).- Kementerian ESDM (Energi dan Sumber Daya Mineral kembali membuka lowongan CPNS (calon Pegawai Negeri Sipil) tahun ini. Pembukaan lowongan CPNS dilakukan serentak bersama seluruh kementerian/lembaga serta pemerintah daerah di seluruh Indonesia.
Kepala Biro Komunikasi Layanan Informasi Publik dan Kerja Sama Kementerian ESDM Agung Pribadi mengatakan, pendaftaran CPNS Kementerian ESDM akan dilakukan pada 11-24 November 2019. Pendaftaran dilakukan secara online melalui https://sscasn.bkn.go.id/.
"Untuk tahun ini, peserta hanya bisa mendaftar pada satu instansi juga satu formasi di kementerian/ lembaga/pemda," ujarnya melalui siaran pers, Minggu 3 November 2019.
Formasi CPNS yang dibuka Kementerian ESDM tahun ini, menurut dia, akan diumumkan pada 11 November. Untuk itu, dia mengingatkan agar pelamar segera menyiapkan dokumen persyaratan sejak awal.
Dokumen persyaratan yang harus disiapkan antara lain: scan Kartu Tanda Penduduk (KTP), pas foto dan swafoto, ijazah serta transkrip untuk memastikan jurusan pelamar sesuai dengan formasi yang dituju.
Sementara formasi yang dibutuhkan, menurut dia, akan diumumkan segera di kanal resmi Kementerian ESDM.
"Bagi yang tertarik mengabdi membangun sektor ESDM, diharapkan segera menyiapkan syarat administrasi yang dimaksud, dan yang paling penting, jangan percaya apabila yang menawarkan bantuan dan meminta imbalan, semua rekruitmen di Kementerian ESDM semua fair dan tidak berbayar," tutur Agung.
Periode pembukaan CPNS akan dilaksanakan pada November, dilanjutkan dengan pengumuman hasil seleksi administrasi pada Desember.
Tahun ini, pemerintah membuka lowongan 152.250 formasi CPNS yang tersebar di 68 kementerian/lembaga dan 462 pemerintah daerah.***

Ministry of Energy and Mineral Resources opens CPNS Formation Vacancies, There are Requirements that Must Be Prepared
03 Nov 2019, 10:55 by Ai Rika Rachmawati
BANDUNG, (PR) .- The Ministry of ESDM (Energy and Mineral Resources re-opened CPNS (prospective Civil Servants) vacancies this year. Opening CPNS vacancies is carried out simultaneously with all ministries / institutions and local governments throughout Indonesia.
The Head of the Ministry of Energy and Mineral Resources' Public Information and Cooperation Communication Agency, Agung Pribadi, said that the registration of the CPNS of the Ministry of Energy and Mineral Resources will be conducted on 11-24 November 2019. Registration is done online via https://sscasn.bkn.go.id/.
"For this year, participants can only register at one agency as well as one formation at the ministry / agency / local government," he said through a press release, Sunday 3 November 2019.
According to him, the CPNS formation opened by the Ministry of Energy and Mineral Resources this year will be announced on November 11. For this reason, he reminded applicants to immediately prepare the required documents from the beginning.
Required documents that must be prepared include: a scan of Identity Card (KTP), a photo and selfie photograph, diploma and transcript to ensure the applicant's direction is in accordance with the intended formation.
While the required formation, according to him, will be announced soon on the official channel of the Ministry of Energy and Mineral Resources.
"For those who are interested in serving the ESDM sector, they are expected to immediately prepare the intended administrative requirements, and most importantly, do not believe if those who offer assistance and ask for compensation, all recruitments at the Ministry of Energy and Mineral Resources are all fair and not paid," said Agung.
The CPNS opening period will be held in November, followed by the announcement of the results of administrative selection in December.
This year, the government opens 152,250 vacancies for CPNS formations spread across 68 ministries / institutions and 462 local governments. ***
